initial_question.title: 2bit Packing logic post Bit Balance Strategy
initial_question.body:
I want some more understanding on how to pack the 2 bit weights after using bit balance strategy. 

While running blockwise quantization we have increased our range from 4 to 5 and values to {-2,-1,0,1,2}. After running the ABQ LLM for 2 bit, I will be having float weights which are good to quantize to 2 bits, but the problem here is with the packing logic. 
1.  How to represent the above range using 2 bits and pack them ?
2.  If we use default 2 bit quantization, won't I lose the benefit of bit balance strategy ?

satisfaction_conditions: The solution must maintain acceleration capabilities
